gabriel.acl
Class AclEntry

java.lang.Object
  gabriel.acl.AclEntry
public class AclEntry
extends java.lang.Object

AclEntry which maps a principal to permissions. Entries can be negative which will cancel the permission for a principal.

Version:
$Id: AclEntry.html,v 1.1.1.1 2004-06-16 07:56:34 stephan Exp $
Author:
Stephan J. Schmidt
